"""Handle User model to be used in the application
"""
from datetime import datetime
from typing import Tuple

from ..models.user import User as _User
from .register import Register as _Register

    Attributes:

    """


[docs]    @staticmethod
    async def add_user(data: dict) -> Tuple[bool, _User or None]:
        """Add a new user to the database

        Args:
            data (dict): The data of the user

        Returns:
            response (Tuple): Tuple[bool,str or None], The response of the operation and the uuid of the user
        """
        uuid = data.get("token")
        password = data.get("password")
        username, first_name, last_name = await _Register.update_at_user_creation(uuid)
        if username is None and first_name is None and last_name is None:
            return False, None
        response, data = await _User.create(
            username=username,
            password=password,
            first_name=first_name,
            last_name=last_name,
            to_dict=True,
        )
        if not response:
            return False, None
        return True, data



[docs]    @staticmethod
    async def request_reset_password(username: str) -> Tuple[bool or None, str or None]:
        """Request a reset password

        Args:
            username (str): The username of the user

        Returns:
            response (Tuple): Tuple[bool,str or None], The response of password_change_needed
        """
        user = await _User.read.by_username(username)
        if user is None:
            return None, None
        if user.password_change_needed:
            return False, None
        return await _User.update(user.id, dict(password_change_needed=True))



[docs]    @staticmethod
    async def update_password_by_request(
        username: str, password: str
    ) -> Tuple[bool or None, str or None]:
        """Update the password of the user

        Args:
            username (str): The username of the user
            password (str): The new password of the user

        Returns:
            response (bool): True if the password was updated
        """
        user = await _User.read.by_username(username)
        if user is None:
            return None, None
        if not user.password_change_needed:
            return False, None
        return await _User.update(
            user.id,
            dict(
                password_hash=password,
                password_change_needed=0,
                password_changed_date=datetime.now(),
            ),
        )
